diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy, Mitochondrial Inheritance, Autosomal Recessive Inheritance, X-linked Inheritance
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient has a family history of early-onset dilated cardiomyopathy with multiple affected siblings, pointing to a genetic underpinning. Genetic counseling suggested possible inheritance patterns, leading to the conclusion of familial dilated cardiomyopathy upon the identification of mutations in the MYBPC3 gene, presumed to be pathogenic.
